name: Microwaved Circus Peanut
description:
An open-source game where you play as a professional liar

In the modern age, all politicians do is lie to increase their popularity among people. In this game, you play as an upcoming politician aiming to increase their social media following by making lies about people, things and places. You will be presented with a choice of phrases to attempt to put together as horrible a tweet as possible, and gain followers for how much of a dirty lie it is.

You can clone or see the source code here.

This game was created for Community Game Jam August 2019.
